properties.name: Landmark task
properties.definition_text: Subjects performed two alternate tasks, namely tell if a horizontal line is crossed precisely in the middle (LANDMARK) and tell if a horizontal line is crossed at all (DETECTION). The following instructions were used: âPress the button with your left index finger if the line is bisected in the middle otherwise press the button with your right fingerâ or âPress the button with your left index finger if the line is crossed otherwise press the button with your right fingerâ.
